summary: A test suite that validates the tokenization pipeline for a multilingual translation model, covering full tokenization, handling of new language identifiers, preparation of sequence-to-sequence batches, persistence of tokenizer configurations, conversion between fast and slow implementations, initialization of special tokens, and training of custom tokenizers.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the tokenization components used in multilingual translation services, thereby supporting reliable model deployment and maintenance.
